items.content_html: NFSFU234 Form Validation is a lightweight and user-friendly JavaScript library designed for validating HTML form elements, with a special emphasis on textarea fields. It offers customizable validation messages, comprehensive support for required field checks, seamless inline error displays, and convenient modal error notifications.
